body:
> 是不是broker配置文件中的brokerClusterName多个空格？

没有啊，下载的整个源码包，没改broker包下的代码的，还特意去看了brokerConfig那个类，也没得空格。
找到原因了,不知道哪次启动的时候自动初始化创建了一个conf目录,然后里面自动生成的broker.conf的clusterName多了一个空格,然后属性混淆的时候就把这个里面的混淆给了brokerConfig对象

> This is a good issue on how to expose netty parameters. In addition, I think clientCloseSocketIfTimeout should be true by default. Could you submit a PR to modify it？

ok, i will sumbit a PR to modify it, some properties in NettyClientConfig are exposed by System Property, i will change other properties the same

[Continue to review full report at Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/apache/rocketmq/pull/2721?src=pr&el=continue).
> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/apache/rocketmq/pull/2721?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [e277216...86bea21](https://codecov.io/gh/apache/rocketmq/pull/2721?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

> 为什么无法确定事务的状态？executeLocalTransaction 方法是执行本地事务，执行完成后就知道是否成功，从而返回commit或rollback。

我是在两个数据库操作中执行的发事务消息操作，所以发消息时候，整个事务没有执行完毕，无法确定。sendMessageInTransaction在sendOk后就开始executeLocalTransaction这个方法，应该在这里面要写全部业务？这样的话理解起来像是发了消息再执行业务，而不是执行完业务发了条消息。

When a new consumer sends a heartbeat to a broker, the broker will notify all consumers of the related group to do rebalance. If there are multiple brokers, a consumer will receive multiple notifications.

In the rebalance process, the consumer selects a broker randomly to look up the consumer list. If the consumer did not send any heartbeat to the broker at the time, the returned list is incorrect.

> When a new consumer sends a heartbeat to a broker, the broker will notify all consumers of the related group to do rebalance. If there are multiple brokers, a consumer will receive multiple notifications.
> 
> In the rebalance process, the consumer selects a broker randomly to look up the consumer list. If the consumer did not send any heartbeat to the broker at the time, the returned list is incorrect.

yes, and incorrect consumer list should not result in lost msgs since it will be corrected anyway.  My major confusion is the first question, why one messageQueue is  processed(Pull Task) by two pull threads(suggested  by rocketmq-client log).  Do you have any ideas?
@Zanglei06 Multiple rebalance processes with different consumer lists will cause this issue.

If rocketmq use docker or multiple network cards, rocketmq should initiate a UDP request to an external IP, and then get the IP address of the current server. rocketmq cannot use the system call of InetAddress API。It's just my idea
You can use protobuf to replace fastjson.

> As fast as I know, client does not retry when broker busy #1196 #2542.
> Could rocketmq support retrying by customizing response code.
> it's very convenient for user if they want to retry when broker busy.

IMO, retry automatically will weight rmq pressure when occur broker busy

> Rocketmq won't retry if system busy according to PR #1196
> We also want to know what we can do if meet system busy. #2713 the answer tell us that retrying may aggravate this situation, but it's impossible for us to do nothing or throw message.
> 
> Could rocketmq provide a boolean method to indicate whether system busy in server side.
> We need to know when we can send messages and it's ok for us to wait until server is available

It's difficult to judge system is really busy, sometime momentary pressure can cause busy, then decline quickly.
This function exists in metaq, it's indeed useful in some cases, such as log report and some data insensitive cases.
@xiangyang-gao 如果链接都不想要了,那么 rocketmq 的 client 也相当于停止了,  为什么不重新 `new DefaultMQPushConsumer()` 呢? 线程不存在了, 任务其实已经算停止了吧;

> > As fast as I know, client does not retry when broker busy #1196 #2542.
> > Could rocketmq support retrying by customizing response code.
> > it's very convenient for user if they want to retry when broker busy.
> 
> IMO, retry automatically will weight rmq pressure when occur broker busy

Previously, most of answers just tell us retying will weight rocketmq pressure,  but don't tell us how to do if meet broker busy.
IMO, rocketmq can provide a config to enable it and users can choose whether to turn it on or not.

Start RocketMQ first, then set the file system to read only。file system！Not a  file。




------------------ 原始邮件 ------------------
发件人:                                                                                                                        "apache/rocketmq"                                                                                    ***@***.***>;
发送时间: 2021年3月25日(星期四) 下午5:10
***@***.***>;
***@***.******@***.***>;
主题: Re: [apache/rocketmq] SEND_OK will still be returned when the storage is abnormal  ，which may cause message loss (#2706)





      
when the flush is abnormal ，SEND_OK will still be returned 。It will cause possible message loss .
 I will submit a PR to fix it
 code show as below ：
 public int flush(final int flushLeastPages) {     if (this.isAbleToFlush(flushLeastPages)) {         if (this.hold()) {             int value = getReadPosition();             try {                 //We only append data to fileChannel or mappedByteBuffer, never both.                 if (writeBuffer != null || this.fileChannel.position() != 0) {                     this.fileChannel.force(false);                 } else {                     this.mappedByteBuffer.force();                 }             } catch (Throwable e) {                 log.error("Error occurred when force data to disk.", e);             }             this.flushedPosition.set(value);             this.release();         } else {             log.warn("in flush, hold failed, flush offset = " + this.flushedPosition.get());             this.flushedPosition.set(getReadPosition());         }     }     return this.getFlushedPosition(); }
  
Can u details the situation, such as rmq version, and replicas setting?
  
You can see that if there is an error, a try catch will be performed .Then log.error("Error occurred when force data to disk.", e);
 But there is no error code returned to the client, and the client still thinks that the send is successful.
  
org.apache.rocketmq.store.CommitLog.GroupCommitService#doCommit
 You can see this method，if flush failed，the flushedWhere offset will not change。Then the value of PutMessageStatus will be FLUSH_DISK_TIMEOUT
  
I do not think so.
 First of all, I can reproduce the problem. If the flush fails, it will still return SEND_OK. And after modifying the code, the problem is solved.So there must be a problem
 
From the code analysis, even if the flush fails, docommit does not know. this.flushedPosition.set(value) will be executed no matter what。
 
You can try to make the file system read-only, and then you can reproduce the problem
  
测试过，如果在运行过程中，将文件改为只读，是可以强刷的。启动前改为只读，会报异常。您是怎么测试的呀
